data.name: Unlimited World Book: Retro
data.detailed_description:
Unlimited World Book: Retro is a single-player story game. The story takes place on a cold and frosty planet called Astra I. The game offers 2 episodes but the story continues also in the Unlimited World 1.


This is the origin story of a character called Dr. Edward Retro who has a normal life in the 18th century until the Reaper came and destroyed his whole village! When he notice that he must go to the castle, the only safe place around but notice that the Reaper already got there and now our protagonist Retro has to escape from the Reaper but how will he do that? Thats your task!


For this game we have planned an entire series of games which all tell a unique story!

Here is a list of what we release next & might already released.

data.short_description: Unlimited World Book: Retro is a single-player story game about the origin story of the character Doctor Edward Retro from Unlimited World 1.
data.supported_languages:
English*, German, Turkish, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Processor: 64-bit, 2 GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Newer
  • Processor: 64-bit, 3 GHz or Faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
